abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Volta Grande Hydroelectric
            Project will assist in financing a 360 MW hydroelectric
            power plant, a 400 MW hydroelectric power plant, a 400 MW
            hydroelectric power plant, and associated 345 kv and 138 kv
            transmission facilities.
